author: Rosie
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog, if you run into any issues or have any questions, you can find me in the Red servers or DM me @blizzthewolf. You are also free to open an issue on [my repository](https://git.purplepanda.cc/blizz/blizz-cogs). Play a game by using `[p]wordscramble`!
name: Clap
description: Get a scrambled word and try to unscramble it within a short time!
